title: Knowledge Formation and Learning Design Sequence (LDS) Application in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational understanding of sociology
context.additional_context: Involving learners from diverse cultural backgrounds, utilizing smartphones and tablets as primary learning tools

learning_goals: Students can understand the theoretical foundations of Learning Design Sequences (LDS) and apply them to practical cases.
Students can design and implement knowledge-construction processes using diverse media (text, images, videos).
Students can analyze knowledge transformation processes in multicultural societies and write reports through project-based assessments.

resources: Free Digital Authoring Tools (e.g., Canva, CapCut)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
